name: Star Song
description:
Star Song is a 3D explorative narrative game about exploring the town the main character lives in and talking to marketplace merchants. The game follows Marin, a Scrollkeeper's assistant who has been tasked with locating the whereabouts of an important scroll that has been stolen.  

This project was my university capstone project which was made in the space of 8 months. During this I focused on the research question  “Using set design conventions, how can I create a marketplace that reflects the personality of the inhabitants.” 

Environmental assets -  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/fantastic-village-... 

Fountain asset - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/fountain-e9f30339fb764dd7b78e2149e2e6cb41

Horse asset - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/knights-horse-e813eb5569694c5c88ee34d84a3055f3

Music - Eric Matyas
